strings.Value: {n}Valerie looks gloomy.{/n} "I heard rumors that my old mentor, Fredero Sinnet, assembled his entourage and left the boundaries of the {g|Stolen Lands}Stolen Lands{/g}. It looks like we didn't make it to the trading post before his patience was exhausted."

{n}The girl waves carelessly.{/n} "It might be for the best. I'm sure you have enough problems without a fanatic paladin claiming rights to me as property of the Order of the {g|Shelyn}Eternal Rose{/g}. Pff!"

{n}Valerie looks at you from under her eyebrows.{/n} "I heard a rumors that Fredero Sinnet, a paladin from the Order of the {g|Shelyn}Eternal Rose{/g} was killed at the trading post. Slaughtered with his entire entourage. Oleg and Svetlana are keeping silent about it, like they're afraid of snitching on someone."
"We need to guard your lands more carefully, {name}. It's unlikely you'll ever create a proper state here if such unpunished atrocities keep happening."
